member.summary: Gets or sets the user name for this user.

member.summary: Gets or sets the normalized user name for this user.

member.summary: Gets or sets the email address for this user.

member.summary: Gets or sets the normalized email address for this user.

member.name: P:Cross.WebHost.Entities.User.EmailConfirmed
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating if a user has confirmed their email address.
member.value: True if the email address has been confirmed, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Cross.WebHost.Entities.User.PasswordHash
member.summary: Gets or sets a salted and hashed representation of the password for this user.

member.name: P:Cross.WebHost.Entities.User.SecurityStamp
member.summary: A random value that must change whenever a users credentials change (password changed, login removed)

member.name: P:Cross.WebHost.Entities.User.ConcurrencyStamp
member.summary: A random value that must change whenever a user is persisted to the store

member.name: P:Cross.WebHost.Entities.User.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a telephone number for the user.

member.name: P:Cross.WebHost.Entities.User.PhoneNumberConfirmed
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating if a user has confirmed their telephone address.
member.value: True if the telephone number has been confirmed, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Cross.WebHost.Entities.User.TwoFactorEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating if two factor authentication is enabled for this user.
member.value: True if 2fa is enabled, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Cross.WebHost.Entities.User.LockoutEnd
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time, in UTC, when any user lockout ends.
member.remarks: A value in the past means the user is not locked out.

member.name: P:Cross.WebHost.Entities.User.LockoutEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating if this user is locked out.
member.value: True if the user is locked out, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Cross.WebHost.Entities.User.AccessFailedCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of failed login attempts for the current user.

member.summary: User crated time
